substitution.copyText: " When I had seen this hot love on the wing, | " As I perceiv'd it (I must tell you that) | " Before my daughter told me; what might you
If I had plaid the Dusk, or Table book, | " Or given my heart a winking, mute and dumb, | Or lookt upon this love with idle sight,
substitution.amendedText: If I had | lookt upon this love with idle sight,

substitution.copyText: Fell into a sadness, then into a fast, | " Thence to a watch, then into a weakness, | Thence to a lightness, and by this declension
substitution.amendedText: Fell into a sadness | and by this declension
